instructions.text: Ensure all class names are in PascalCase.
Check for the use of '===' instead of '=='.
Verify that all functions have appropriate return types.
Ensure all loops have proper termination conditions.
Check for the use of template literals instead of string concatenation.
Ensure all async functions handle errors using try-catch.
Verify that all dependencies are listed in package.json.
Check for consistent indentation using 2 spaces.
